Package com.shop.util.generic

Interface Summary
GenericIOClient<T> Client/connection abstraction.
GenericIOLineProcessor.AcceptLine<T> Driver to receive lines
GenericIOServer<T> Server abstraction.
GenericIOServerListener<T> Callback/notifications for servers
 

Class Summary
GenericIOClientPool<T> Manages a pool of connections to a single GenericIOServer server.
GenericIOFactory Factory for creating clients and servers
GenericIOLineProcessor<T> Utility to read lines from a client in a loop.
GenericIOLoadBalancer<T> Manages connections to a farm of servers (that implement the GenericIOClient/GenericIOServer protocol).
The boilerplate code for using this class is:
GenericIOParameters Common parameters for making servers and clients
